title: Lower Prices! A Couple of Obaks and a Zeenut For Sale!
author: Orioles1954

posts.post_title: Lower Prices! A Couple of Obaks and a Zeenut For Sale!
posts.post_content:
Need to raise funds for a purchase. These cards have been in my personal collection for a long time. Roy Castleton was the first Mormon to play in the big leagues while Spencer Adams was the first Mormon to play in the World Series. No matter what, these are neat cards.

1910 T212 Obak and 1911 T212 Obak Castleton grade (GD) each with moderate creasing, nice colors, decent centering, and clean backs, with some soiling on the 1911. I'm asking $20 each on these.

1924 Zeenuts Adams grades (FR) but also comes with a page taken from a 1925 World Series program. Heck, I'll even add a TCMA Spencer Adams cards. Most of his collectibles in one shot! (sorry Middy Bread)--Asking $20.

Paypal is preferred, shipping included with delivery conf. Thanks so much!

James

One *bump* to note lower prices.

James
Email sent re the 1924 Zeenuts - Adams card.
E-mail sent on the Obaks.  I'll take 'em if still available.  Thanks!
